variables.name: $value
variables.description: The numeric value for which a text alias is desired.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature being calculated.

variables.name: $originalFeature
variables.description: The previous state of the feature being calculated.

variables.name: $featureSet
variables.description: A collection of features in the same table as the $feature evaluating the expression.

variables.name: $datastore
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same feature service or database as the $feature executing the script.

properties.name: editType
properties.description: Indicates whether the edit event is INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, or NA (not applicable).

variables.name: $rowindex
variables.description: The position of a row in the table (zero based).

variables.name: $record
variables.description: Provides access to the attribute/field values of the record being calculated.

variables.description: The feature which is to be drawn on the map.

variables.description: A dictionary of configuration values.

variables.description: The feature requiring a Z value.

variables.description: The source feature for the field map.

variables.name: $targetFeature

variables.name: $sourceLayer
variables.description: A collection of features in the same layer as $sourcefeature.

variables.name: $targetLayer
variables.description: A collection of features in the same layer as $targetfeature.

variables.name: $map
variables.description: A collection of layers in the map of the executing arcade expression.

variables.name: $sourceDatastore
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same datastore as the $sourcelayer.

variables.name: $targetDatastore
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same datastore as the $targetlayer.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature being evaluated for the constraint.

variables.name: $originalFeature
variables.description: The previous state of the feature.

variables.name: $layer
variables.description: A collection of features in the same layer as $feature.

variables.name: $datastore
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same feature service or database as $feature.

properties.name: editType
properties.description: Indicates whether the edit event is INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, or NA (not applicable).

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature being calculated.

variables.name: $feedfeature
variables.description: The input feature (e.g. a device location or a feature) which caused the geotrigger to be activated. This feature must include a geometry (usually a point) and a fixed schema with the following properties: `course` (the course of the location in degrees clockwise, 0 being true north), and `horizontalaccuracy` (the horizontal accuracy of the location in meters).

variables.name: $fencefeature
variables.description: The fence feature (e.g. an area of interest) which was entered or exited and caused the Geotrigger to be activated.

variables.name: $fencenotificationtype
variables.description: A description of the event that occurred - either "entered" or "exited".

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature whose label is to be drawn on the map.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature whose values may be displayed in the layout.

variables.name: $locationupdate
variables.description: The location update feature (e.g. from GPS) being evaluated for the constraint.

properties.name: course
properties.description: The course of the location in degrees clockwise, 0 being true North.

properties.name: horizontalaccuracy
properties.description: The horizontal accuracy of the location in meters.

properties.name: verticalaccuracy
properties.description: The vertical accuracy of the location in meters.

properties.name: velocity
properties.description: The velocity of the location in meters per second.

variables.name: $measure
variables.description: The interpolated M-value for the marker location.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature which is to be drawn on the map.

properties.name: scale
properties.description: Returns the scale of the map at the time the expression evaluates.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: Provides access to the attributes and geometry of the feature whose popup is to be displayed in the view.

variables.name: $layer
variables.description: A collection of features in the same layer as the $feature whose popup is displayed in the view. This only applies to feature service layers.

variables.name: $map
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same map as the $feature whose popup is displayed in the view. This only applies to feature service layers.

variables.name: $datastore
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same feature service or database as the $feature whose popup is displayed in the view. This only applies to feature service layers.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: Provides access to the aggregate fields defined in either clustering or binning popups.

variables.name: $aggregatedFeatures
variables.description: A FeatureSet containing all the features represented by the cluster or bin.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: Exposes the feature's attributes for use in the calculation.

variables.name: $layer
variables.description: A collection of features in the same layer as $feature.

variables.name: $datastore
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same feature service or database as $feature.

variables.name: $map
variables.description: A collection of feature service layers in the map used by the QuickCapture project. This variable may be null.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature being evaluated by the task.

variables.name: $datastore
variables.description: A collection of layers in the same feature service or database as the $feature being evaluated by the task.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: In analytic tools with single inputs, the feature being calculated, evaluated or operated upon.

variables.name: $target
variables.description: In analytic tools with two inputs, the feature being evaluated for filtering or enrichment.

variables.name: $join
variables.description: In analytic tools with two inputs, the feature supplying values for evaluation or enrichment of the target feature.

variables.name: $analytic
variables.description: Time values associated with the analytic such as start time, last end time, etc.

variables.name: $feature
variables.description: The feature which is to be drawn on the map.

properties.name: scale
properties.description: Returns the scale of the map at the time the expression evaluates.
